mapper.select: update INSBRiskrenewalitem set operator = #{operator},modifytime = #{modifytime},noti = #{noti},riskid = #{riskid},reitemname = #{reitemname},istraffic = #{istraffic},isbusiness = #{isbusiness},istrafficandbusiness = #{istrafficandbusiness},presentation = #{presentation} where id = #{id}
